text: If you become a Paid User, a third party payment processor, such as Stripe, will collect payment information such as credit card number, expiration date, and billing address.

The Site and affiliated third parties may use "cookies" (a small data file sent to Skej from your hard drive), embedded scripts, pixels, or web beacons ("Tracking Technologies") to collect information automatically as you interact with the website.

We use your account information in order to create and maintain your account, and verify access to our Site.
We may retain anonymous information as described above as long as it's legally allowed so that we can continue improving the Site and its Services.
We use your billing information in order to process subscription payments, verify your eligibility to use our Services, and notify you of current and future charges.
We will also retain your contact information if you choose to continue receiving marketing or other communications from us.

We use the content provided in emails, direct messages, texts, and other communications you include Skej on in order to find and present availability, scheduling and modify meetings, update preferences, and save contact information.

For Skej to work its magic, we need to collect certain private information from our users, but we don't take that responsibility lightly.
